exceptions.exn: In environment P : R -> R -> Prop x, y : R Hloc : locally_2d P x y Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y0 : ?T, ball ?M2439 eps y0 -> (fun y1 : ?T => locally y1 ?M2440) y0" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y0 : R_UniformSpace, ball y eps y0 -> (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t) y0".

In environment P : R -> R -> Prop x, y : R Hloc : locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z)) Unable to unify "locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))" with "locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)".

original: intros P x y Hloc. apply locally_locally. apply locally_2d_locally in Hloc. apply Hloc.
